quoteText:
• Posting someone else's plugin or resource is not allowed. This includes minor edits such as configuration changes and code taken directly from tutorials or other resources.
    1. "Premium Resources" are held to a higher standard of originality and have greater punishments associated with breaching of these rules.
title: This service will aid you when other users infringe on your copyright

tosdr.case: This service will aid you when other users infringe on your copyright
tosdr.tldr: Reporting a leaked plugin / reuploaded plugin will result in the leaker / reuploader being punished and the plugin being removed.
